entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Indian Head
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:28 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Indian Head AAFC 01:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
Temperature: -6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -7.4°C
Wind: E 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Blizzard developing this evening and ending before morning then cloudy. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
